posts.post_content:
Although I am sure that any flavour enthusiasts would probably already know this, his two commands appear on other cards:
  
   
["Crush them!"](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=107693)   
["We eat!"](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=107598)   
   
These are actually the only two flavour texts attributed to Borborygmos, too!
  
   
Anyway, this card just screams "fun". Love the pure beatdown flavour here. =)

posts.post_content: Gruul Smash! Each of the Ravnican guilds played differently and had its own flavor, and this creature really embodies everything Gruul. There is no subtlety, there is no guile - only big creatures, direct spells, and creatures that...make themselves bigger.

posts.post_content: The Gruul are the most powerful, destructive, and ferocious guild in Ravnica. And their leader embodies all of it. Posted By: Luke_BPC (10/20/2010 5:55:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Love the flavor text, captures the essence of the card perfectly. Whoever doesn't like playing fatties like this, is probably losing sight of what's funn in magic. Sure, I know there is a thrill in seeing your opponents face when you've countered or bounced their fatty, I've done it and felt it. But there isn't a more satisfying feeling then seeing the horror on your enemies face as a huge creature bears down on them and they realize that there isn't a chance of being alive after it hits. And in a multi-player game, seeing that your creatures are now too big to deal with is pretty sweet too.
posts.html:
